items.sentence: Tom nodded as he listened to the applause fade.
How do I get to your office from Tokyo Station?
Where can I catch the bus to the Tokyo station?
We ran out of gas on the way to downtown Tokyo.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are ready to leave.
We should've dealt with that problem ourselves.
I didn't get to meet Tom while I was in Boston.
The last time that I saw Tom was at your place.
Tom didn't tell anyone why he'd gone to Boston.
Tom has to stay in Australia for one more week.
